summary: This document consists of email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley, discussing a call that was not made due to the late hour in London. The communication is marked as confidential and may contain attorney-client privileged information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing a missed call with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, mentioned as being back in Indiana and planning to call Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are in communication regarding personal matters, indicating a social connection.

keyFacts: The email correspondence is dated October 2, 2009.
Jeffrey Epstein expresses that it was late in London and did not want to call back.
Jes Staley mentions he is back in Indiana and will call that morning.
The email contains a confidentiality notice and may be attorney-client privileged.
The communication is marked as confidential and includes disclaimers regarding legal and financial information.
